segments.text: I'm really taken aback by this kitchen snapshot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet's running full blast, and the sink is brim full.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water cascading over the edge, I didn't expect that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman hasn't noticed, still focused on her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron and dress look so proper amid the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Behind her, the boy's on a stool reaching high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Whoa, that stool is leaning way back, dangerously so.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's snagging cookies from the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's right there, hand out for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a serene garden, totally opposite.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I never thought a simple dish drying could hide so much.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stacked dishes on the counter add to the busyness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's all so unexpectedly layered with hazards.
segments.speaker: PAR
